block.heading: Boarding School Guardianship
block.paragraph: Professional, first class guardianship service to overseas students in UK Boarding Schools and Colleges.

block.heading: University Guardianship
block.paragraph: Professional, first class guardianship service to overseas students in UK Boarding Schools and Colleges.

block.heading: Boarding Schools
block.paragraph: We offers expert Boarding School placement advice to overseas parents and agents.

block.heading: Guardianship
block.paragraph: Bright World provides a professional, first class guardianship service to overseas students in UK Boarding Schools and Colleges. Our leading programmes are available at over 500 schools and colleges across England, Scotland and Wales.

block.heading: Boarding School
block.paragraph: Bright World offers expert Boarding School placement advice to overseas parents and agents. Our placement service ensures that all our students find their place within a UK Independent Boarding School.

block.heading: Holiday Programmes
block.paragraph: Bright World offers a selection of holiday courses available at a range of UK Boarding Schools, Colleges and Centres.

block.heading: UK University Guardianship
block.paragraph: Bright World offers a comprehensive, UK Guardianship to overseas students studying at UK University. Students aged under 18 at the point of admission to a UK University will be required to nominate a UK guardian.

testimonial.quote: Bright World is a highly efficient Guardianship Organisation that provides a quality service for the students that they care for. Children’s safety and welfare is at the heart of the service that they provide.
testimonial.author: Jacqueline Scotney, Lead Inspector, AEGIS

testimonial.quote: Dear Cory, we would like to thank you for the perfect services you provided Nicolas. It was always a pleasure to work with you. All the best!
testimonial.author: Felix Schmid

testimonial.quote: Bright World helped us in many situations that needed special attention and prompt action.
testimonial.author: Yana Torokhova

testimonial.quote: I have to say that Bright World provides the best guardianship service I have known in my 15 years in boarding. So thank you very much from me my team and on behalf of the pupils.
testimonial.author: John Gale, Housemaster, LVS

block.heading: How do guardians work with schools?
block.paragraph: Whether applying for guardianship as a parent, overseas agent or student. When it comes to schools and guardians, just like any relationship; partnership, compromise and flexibility are key. But how do both parties navigate what can be, at times a tricky relationship?

block.heading: Why is my UK boarding school is asking me to appoint a guardian?
block.paragraph: You’ve just arrived at school, you’re all set to start your first term and you are asked for the name of your nominated UK guardian. So, what is a guardian, and why is your school asking you to appoint one?
